name: Green Fitness-Motivate Workout
description:
Burn calories to plant beautiful trees? It sounds impossible but now available in our interestingly motivational game for fitness! We make workout a worth playing game. This app is:

- Suitable for all levels from beginners to hardcore workout athletes.
- Using the calories you burn through your workout or fitness activities to play the farming game.
- Setting your own targets and motivating you to meet your goals through different levels of tree on a daily basis.
- Visualizing your workout timeline for a better review of how much effort you have made.

Green Fitness reads HealthKit steps & workouts to calculate your burned calories overtime to decide how much energy you can use for tree planting.

WHY GREEN FITNESS?
- Make your workout not to be boring anymore.
- Share your fitness results as the beautiful farm you have built by your own calories.
- Motivational quotes every day to remind you of being fitter and healthier.
- Different levels of challenge that tailor to all users.
- Play game with your friends and challenge them to do the same.

No more boring, no more challenging!
Are you ready to be fit and healthy? Join us to get fit in an exciting way.

Contact us: support@vulcanlabs.co
